Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: “This recount reaffirmed what we already knew from the June 18th primary.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: defeating incumbent Rep. Bob Good (R-Farmville) by fewer than 400 votes.; a former Navy Seal

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: It really is amazing what we can achieve when we work as a team.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: defeating incumbent Rep. Bob Good (R-Farmville) by fewer than 400 votes.; a former Navy Seal

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: It is an honor to be the VA 05 Republican nominee.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: defeating incumbent Rep. Bob Good (R-Farmville) by fewer than 400 votes.; a former Navy Seal

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: I want to thank God and extend my sincere thanks to my family, to everyone who helped out on this campaign, to the people who endorsed and supported me, and to Donald J. Trump.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: defeating incumbent Rep. Bob Good (R-Farmville) by fewer than 400 votes.; a former Navy Seal

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Folks in the 5th District can rest assured that should they elect me in November, they will have an effective fighter in Congress who will get the job done.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: defeating incumbent Rep. Bob Good (R-Farmville) by fewer than 400 votes.; a former Navy Seal

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: I look forward to working with Trump to defeat Kamala Harris and to helping elect Hung Cao in November.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: defeating incumbent Rep. Bob Good (R-Farmville) by fewer than 400 votes.; a former Navy Seal

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Now is the time to set our differences aside and unite as a party.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: defeating incumbent Rep. Bob Good (R-Farmville) by fewer than 400 votes.; a former Navy Seal

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Together we will Make America Great Again!”
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: defeating incumbent Rep. Bob Good (R-Farmville) by fewer than 400 votes.; a former Navy Seal

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Prior to the election, Senator John McGuire was endorsed by former President Donald J. Trump.
“We have secure and fair elections in Virginia, and Virginians can have confidence in the final results of this race,” Governor Glenn Youngkin wrote via social media.
“I want to thank Congressman Good for his years of service to the people of Virginia’s 5th District, and once again congratulate John McGuire on his victory...
John will make an excellent Congressman!”

“I want to thank the more than 31,000 voters of the 5th District who voted for me in the June 18 primary, and the thousands who volunteered, contributed, prayed, and supported my re-election campaign.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Rep.; Chair for the House Freedom Caucus
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: incumbent; who is also the Chair for the House Freedom Caucus

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: While I am disappointed in the ultimate outcome, it has been my distinct honor to serve as the congressional representative for Virginia’s 5th District over the past 3.5 years.”
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Rep.; Chair for the House Freedom Caucus
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: incumbent; who is also the Chair for the House Freedom Caucus

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: McGuire will face Democrat Gloria Witt in the November general election, with both hoping to represent the Fifth District in the U.S. House of Representatives.
